title: 惊！WaterFall无法蹦极到Catserver
txt_content:
RT当玩家一进入Catserver子服就会被自动踢回到大厅放logmod服：[18:46:20] [User Authenticator #4/INFO]: UUID of player SaltedFishOldXv is 2c
[18:46:20] [Netty Epoll Server IO #0/INFO]: Client protocol version 2
[18:46:22] [Netty Epoll Server IO #0/INFO]: Skipping config sync, No mods have registered a syncable config.
[18:46:25] [Server thread/INFO]: [Server thread] Server side modded connection established
[18:46:25] [Server thread/INFO]: Player [SaltedFishOldXv] connected with Dynamic Surroundings 3.6.0.2
[18:46:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Detected the PlayerJoinEvent of player SaltedFishOldXv
[18:46:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Forced SaltedFishOldXv to defined location.
[18:46:26] [Server thread/INFO]: Sending custom spell data to SaltedFishOldXv
[18:46:26] [Server thread/INFO]: SaltedFishOldXv[/115.63.161.0:59908] logged in with entity id 1768 at ([world]29939.486841668695, 88.5, 30193.13463683691)
[18:46:26] [Server thread/INFO]: 玩家 SaltedFishOldXv 进入了科技空岛
[18:46:28] [Server thread/INFO]: (!)  检查了玩家 SaltedFishOldXv 的 2 个背包
[18:46:28] [Server thread/INFO]: (!)  未发现任何禁用物品
[18:46:28] [pool-22-thread-1/INFO]: [MonthlyCard] Save PlayerData!
[18:46:29] [Server thread/INFO]: [TAB] Disabled in 1ms
[18:46:29] [Server thread/INFO]: [TAB] Enabled in 70ms
[18:46:29] [Server thread/INFO]: [TAB] Reloaded
[18:46:30] [Server thread/INFO]: 玩家 SaltedFishOldXv 离开了科技空岛
[18:46:30] [Server thread/WARN]: handleDisconnection() called twice
复制代码主控：[18:58:56 INFO]: [SaltedFishOldXv|/115.63.161.79:53284] <-> ServerConnector [mod] has connected
[18:59:02 INFO]: [/115.63.161.79:53284|SaltedFishOldXv] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [lobby] has disconnected
[18:59:07 INFO]: [/115.63.161.79:53284|SaltedFishOldXv] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [mod] has disconnected
[18:59:07 INFO]: [SaltedFishOldXv|/115.63.161.79:53284] <-> ServerConnector [lobby] has connected复制代码

replies.txt_content: handleDisconnection() called twice 一般是插件主动踢出玩家 检查一下插件问题

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
2212082263 发表于 2020-7-17 22:49
看贺兰的教程 牌面！，能解释要改哪些吗？四.配置子服务器（转自天空学院）
请将你子服务端目录下的“bukkit.yml”中的“connection-throttle”一项的数值修改为“-1”
请将你子服务端目录下的“server.properties”中的“server-ip”一项的值修改为“127.0.0.1”（原因请参见另一篇关于漏洞解析的帖子）
为了提高安全性，请确保你的服务器防火墙阻断了玩家直接连入后端服务器的请求（最好只给你的BC端开放唯一一个外网端口）
添加服务器列表页图标的方式和普通服务器一样，放一个64*64像素的png文件到BC端文件夹即可，图片名称是“server-icon.png”
如果你想获取到正版玩家的UUID，请在BungeeCord的“config.yml”中设置“ip_forward: true”，并使用spigot/cauldron作为子服务端，然后在“spigot.yml”中设置“bungeecord: true”
改这边的，然后再试试

one_ 发表于 2020-7-17 23:10
